channel.title: [317] [Delta] Server connection problems (and more?)
channel.description:
I just started setting up my first server two days ago, but last night I went to connect to the server (set up on no-ip) and it simply did not connect. After four to five hours of checking every guide I could find, checking all the files that were connection related (both server and client), my friends were breathing down my neck to mess around on the server so I decided to just launch the vanilla source and client with Hamachi, but the default source and client would not connect to each other. The plain client said I was IP banned...
What is this I don't even
Source used: PkPlanet

item.title: [317] [Delta] Server connection problems (and more?)
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

umm is ur port open on what you’r trying to host over?

Read full topic
